genresAdvancedInfo.name: musicas espiritas
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Musicas espiritas, or spiritual music, is a genre of music that is deeply rooted in the Brazilian spiritualist movement. The music is often characterized by its soothing melodies and uplifting lyrics, which aim to promote spiritual growth and enlightenment. It is commonly used in spiritualist centers and gatherings, and is seen as a way to connect with the divine.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify

index.what-is-spotify-top-content: The {strongOpen}easiest{strongClose} way to get stats about your listening history on Spotify. Find out and share your {strongOpen}top artists{strongClose}, {strongOpen}tracks{strongClose}, and {strongOpen}genres{strongClose}.
